content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your electrical needs today?
I just need my kitchen lights fixed ASAP! Can you send someone?
Absolutely, I can help with that! May I please have your address so we can confirm you're in our service area and get someone scheduled for you?
Why do you need my address right now? I already told you what I need! Just do your job and send someone!
I understand, and I want to help as quickly as possible. We just need your address to make sure we can send a technician to you. Could you please share your address?
Thank you for providing your address. Let me check to make sure you're in our service area.
I'm sorry, but it looks like your address is currently outside our service area and we won't be able to send a technician. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.
